title: paahi kalyaaNasundhara
sahitya:
pAhi kalyANasundara rAma mAm pAhi kalyANasundara rAma mAm



caraNam 1



 cadivina vADanu gAnu rAma idi buddhi anucu teliyalEnu

   

caraNam 2



 bhajiyincuTaku buddhi lEka rAma batimAli tirigiti indAka

   

caraNam 3



 dIna dinamudaramu korakE rAma dhanikula gAcitini Ivaraku

   

caraNam 4



 Alu sutulapaini prEma nI padAla nuncanaiti rAma

   

caraNam 5



 samsAra sukhamu satamani nAma sAra mEruga maracitini

   

caraNam 6



 viSaya sukhAdula rOyalEka virravIgi mosamAya

   

caraNam 7



 shuka sannuta nannu kanna taNDri okapari sharaNanu konna

   

caraNam 8



 tammi kannula raghuvIra ninu nammina nannElukOra

   

caraNam 9



 nEramentO jEsinAnu Emi nEramanucu vEDinAnu

 

caraNam 10



 ninu nammuvAridE mElu nI pAda sEva vEyi vElu

 

caraNam 11



 sAkEta rAma nAmIda daya lEkuNDuTaka mariyAdA

 

caraNam 12



 sharaNya kOsalarAja rAma paripAlita tyAgarAja
